data.title: City hall, mayor, stats, schools, attractions, and more
data.meta_description: Located in Ohio, the City of Toledo has a lot to discover. Find more about its City Hall, Mayor, Schools, Banks, Passport Facilities, and Leisure Activities.
data.text:
The City of Toledo is located in the state of Ohio, in Lucas County. Its area, population and other key information are listed below.

For all your administrative procedures, you can go to the City hall of Toledo at the address and schedules indicated on this page or contact the City hall government by phone or by email depending on your preference or on the service's availability.

Update data

Where is Toledo, Ohio ?

Toledo lies in Lucas County, situated in the northwestern part of the United States within the state of Ohio. It is positioned along the western shore of Lake Erie, near the Ohio-Michigan border. Toledo is approximately 60 miles south of Detroit, Michigan, and about 100 miles west of Cleveland, Ohio.
